Key Match Events: England beats Switzerland in a penalty shootout to reach Euro 2024 semifinals
Trent Alexander-Arnold scores the winning goal during a penalty shootout
Bukayo Saka equalizes in the 80th minute to send the game to extra time
Jordan Pickford saves Manuel Akanji's penalty kick
England wins the shootout 5-3 after a 1-1 draw in extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Trent Alexander-Arnold praises the team's character, belief, heart, and spirit
Gareth Southgate reflects on Alexander-Arnold's perseverance despite being benched
Bukayo Saka overcomes past penalty miss and racial abuse to score in the shootout
Gareth Southgate comments on England's 'streetwise' approach to winning games
Murat Yakin expresses sadness for the Swiss players after their defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's manager Gareth Southgate celebrates his 100th game in charge
England advances to play Netherlands in the semifinals
Switzerland exits the European Championship on penalties in the quarterfinals for the second time in a row
England's Harry Kane misses the shootout due to cramp after colliding with Southgate
